ibis.impala.api.ImpalaTable.alter_partition¶

ImpalaTable.alter_partition(spec, location=None, format=None, tbl_properties=None, serde_properties=None)¶

Change setting and parameters of an existing partition

Parameters:

spec : dict or list

The partition keys for the partition being modified

location : string, optional

format : string, optional

tbl_properties : dict, optional

serde_properties : dict, optional
Returns:

None (for now)
